org.apache.flink.runtime.leaderelection

接口 LeaderContender

  • 所有已知实现类:
    Dispatcher, JobManagerRunner, MesosResourceManager, ResourceManager, StandaloneDispatcher, StandaloneResourceManager, YarnResourceManager

    public interface LeaderContender
    Interface which has to be implemented to take part in the leader election process of the LeaderElectionService.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getAddress()
      Returns the address of the LeaderContender under which other instances can connect to it.
      void grantLeadership(java.util.UUID leaderSessionID)
      Callback method which is called by the LeaderElectionService upon selecting this instance as the new leader.
      void handleError(java.lang.Exception exception)
      Callback method which is called by LeaderElectionService in case of an error in the service thread.
      void revokeLeadership()
      Callback method which is called by the LeaderElectionService upon revoking the leadership of a former leader.

    • 方法详细资料

      • grantLeadership

        void grantLeadership(java.util.UUID leaderSessionID)
        Callback method which is called by the LeaderElectionService upon selecting this instance as the new leader. The method is called with the new leader session ID.
        参数:
        leaderSessionID - New leader session ID

      • revokeLeadership

        void revokeLeadership()
        Callback method which is called by the LeaderElectionService upon revoking the leadership of a former leader. This might happen in case that multiple contenders have been granted leadership.

      • getAddress

        java.lang.String getAddress()
        Returns the address of the LeaderContender under which other instances can connect to it.
        返回:
        Address of this contender.

      • handleError

        void handleError(java.lang.Exception exception)
        Callback method which is called by LeaderElectionService in case of an error in the service thread.
        参数:
        exception - Caught exception
